dec: We have three different queries like Buyer, Seller & Admin facilities.
Buyer can buy the product with successful payment by their valid card.
Buyer can report any product to Admin.
Admin has three layouts in the dashboard like all sellers, all buyers & Reported Items. In the reported Item admin see all reported item done by the buyer & Admin is able to delete that product
Seller can add their products & also see her published product. If the seller wants seller able to delete her product.
We have proceted route of My Reviews & Add Services page .
if users can't log in they can not access the processed route .

We have a services page user can see all services with the view details button with each service card. Services card containing an image, price, and name & if the user clicks service image it will be displayed on popup.
After clicking the Services Details button user can see service details & also see each service's reviews. Interesting here user can also add her review but he/she needs to log in first..
After login, the user can see extra two routes which are My Reviews & Adds Services.
To secure our data we have JWT (JSON Web Token). if the user has no token he can't access our data, if the user has a token but is not valid also can't access.
User can download Courses Details PDF to click Download PDF button.
In the navbar, the user can see his profile picture and also see his name on the hover profile image.
if users can't log in they can not access the processed route .
We have proceted route of the checkout page .
